sourcesContent: import { Sans, Serif } from "@artsy/palette" import React from "react" import { Box } from "Styleguide/Elements/Box" import { Flex } from "Styleguide/Elements/Flex" import { Col, Row } from "Styleguide/Elements/Grid" import { Image } from "Styleguide/Elements/Image" import { Separator } from "Styleguide/Elements/Separator" import { Spacer } from "Styleguide/Elements/Spacer" import { Responsive } from "Styleguide/Utils/Responsive" interface ArticleItemProps { imageUrl: string date: string author: string title: string href: string } export const ArticleItem = (props: ArticleItemProps) => { return ( {({ xs }) => { if (xs) return else return }} ) } const LargeArticleItem = (props: ArticleItemProps) => { return ( {props.date} <a href={props.href} className="noUnderline"> {props.title} </a> {props.author} {/* FIXME: Weird block height issue... */} ) } const SmallArticleItem = (props: ArticleItemProps) => { return ( {props.date} <a href={props.href} className="noUnderline"> {props.title} </a> {props.author} {/* FIXME: Weird block height issue... */} ) } const Date = Sans const Title = Serif const Credit = Serif
